sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' function Inscription() { const [nom, setNom] = useState() const [prenom, setPrenom] = useState() const [password, setPassword] = useState() const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() axios.post('http://localhost/register', {nom, prenom, password}) .then(result => console.log(result)) .catch(err => console.log(err)) } return (
setNom(e.target.value)} /> setPrenom(e.target.value)} /> setPassword(e.target.value)} />
) } export default Inscription
